name: Pinball Travels (Demo - March 2023)
description:
This is an early demo version of the first table of the Pinball Travels game.
The full game will be released later this year.

Working
- High Scores (but I will have to manually map your name to your ID)
-Multiball

Not Available
- the minigames for the Australian table
- the other tables
- the achievement system
- settings

Please note: if you appear in the leader boards and post a comment telling me what your score was, I am happy to map your name to the score manually for now.
May the competition begin...
